ingredients: 1/4 cup Archer Farms™ pure orange blossom honey
1 (4 ounce) package Archer Farms™ all natural smoked sockeye salmon
instructions: Combine sour cream, honey and garlic in small bowl; set aside.
Toast bread in toaster; cool slightly. Cut each bread slice in half cross wise.
Spread bread with sour cream mixture. Top with cucumber, salmon and dill sprigs.
title: Smoked Salmon Toast Points
